question: List all the neighbourhoods with Italian restaurant rated less than 2.5 in Madison
query: SELECT t1.neighbourhood_name FROM category AS t3 JOIN business AS t2 ON t3.business_id = t2.business_id JOIN category AS t4 ON t4.business_id = t2.business_id JOIN neighbourhood AS t1 ON t1.business_id = t2.business_id JOIN review as t5 on t2.business_id = t5.business_id WHERE t1.neighbourhood_name = 'Madison'  AND t3.category_name = 'Italian' AND t4.category_name = 'restaurant' GROUP BY t1.neighbourhood_name HAVING AVG(t5.rating) < 2.5
